metadata.feature_description: Show activity indicator icon for users with viewable activities

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Display activity icon for regular users

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Users and view the list of Authorized users
steps.expected: Activity icon should be visible for each regular user in the actions column
steps.actual: Activity icon (User Activity) is displayed for all regular users (Test User12, Test User11, etc.) in the rightmost column alongside Profile Settings, Account Settings, and User Roles icons

steps.action: Filter users by Superusers using the Show dropdown
steps.expected: Activity icon should NOT be displayed for SuperUser accounts
steps.actual: SuperUser Account (host) is displayed with only Profile Settings and Account Settings icons - no User Activity or User Roles icons are shown. The activity icon is correctly hidden for SuperUsers.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify icon click opens activity tab

steps.action: Click on the User Activity icon for Test User12
steps.expected: Activity details panel should open showing user activity metrics
steps.actual: Activity details panel expanded showing: Last Active (moments ago), Rank (2), Reputation (15), Experience (20), Edit Points button, Engagement (0), Influence (2), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity section with 'Joined Site 2 weeks ago EVOQ CONTENT LIBRARY'

observations: Source code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Basic) folder was empty, so code review was not possible. Testing was performed purely through UI verification.
The SHOW_USER_ACTIVITY permission requirement could not be tested as it requires a non-admin user account with specific permissions configured.
Icon tooltip/hover state was not explicitly tested but the icon has accessible name 'User Activity' which serves as tooltip.
